mapper.select: SELECT S.STK_ID CODE_ID, S.STK_CODE || ' - ' || S.STK_DESC CODE_NAME, C.CODE_NAME GROUP_CD FROM SYS0026M S, SAL0016M P, SYS0013M C WHERE S.STK_ID = P.STK_ID AND S.STK_CTGRY_ID = C.CODE_ID AND S.IS_NCV <> 1 AND S.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND S.STK_TYPE_ID = 61 AND P.AMT > 0 GROUP BY S.STK_ID, S.STK_CODE, S.STK_DESC, C.CODE_NAME ORDER BY C.CODE_NAME, S.STK_DESC

SELECT E1.MEM_ID FROM ORG0001D E1 WHERE 1=1
AND E1.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
